    SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGY
  


  
    
      
        SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGY
        
          In today’s world, a social media marketing strategy is no longer an option, it’s a necessity. Just being on social media is not enough – you need goals, consumer insights, analytics and the right creative content delivered on the right platform at the right time. That’s where ASTUDIO comes in. Let’s build the strategy for success.
        

        Contact Us
      
    
  
  
    
  


  

          In today’s world, a social media marketing strategy is no longer an option, it’s a necessity. Just being on social media is not enough – you need goals, consumer insights, analytics and the right creative content delivered on the right platform at the right time. That’s where ASTUDIO comes in. Let’s build the strategy for success.
        
    Contact Us
  


		
	

	
		
			
		
	
FIND YOUR WINNING STRATEGYSTRATEGY SERVICES

	
		
			
  
    
      social media marketing strategy
    
    
      Digital Marketing Strategy
    
    
      Content Marketing Strategy
    
  

		
	

	
		
			
  
    social media marketing strategy
  
  
    Digital Marketing Strategy
  
  
    Content Marketing Strategy
  

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
			SOCIAL STARTS WITH A STRATEGY
We don’t believe in posting for the sake of posting. Everything we do on social kicks off with social media marketing strategy – a clear plan built on your business objectives. From understanding your audience, conducting thorough social media audits and identifying the right social media platforms, to planning your social media advertising strategy versus your organic social media strategy – we have the right game plan for your success.

		
	

	
		
			
  YOU DON’T BUY ENGAGEMENT, YOU BUILD IT

		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	
WHY YOU NEED A SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGY
	
		
			In a landscape with more competition, content, and networks than ever before, an effective social media marketing strategy can lead to more customers and more engagement.

		
	

	
		
			ASTUDIO’S PROCESS WHEN DEVELOPING A SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGY


We help you set goals that make sense for your business
We take the time to get to know your target audience
We can deliver a social strategy with exactly the right platforms, tactics, and approach
We focus on vanity metrics, we dig into data that aligns directly with your goals
We create a strategy for engaging social media content


		
	

	
		
			
OUR SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGY SERVICES
As a Leading Digital Marketing Agency in the region, our Social Media Marketing Services include the following:

Social media account audit
Brand reputation analysis
In-depth competitor analysis
Data-driven social media strategy
Social media advertising strategy
Organic social media strategy



		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
			We believe that a social media strategy should deliver real, tangible results. So we follow an effective process that improves your ROI:

Increase brand awareness
Generate leads and sales
Grow your brand’s audience
Boost community engagement
Drive traffic to your site


		
	

	
		
			
Content is king, and your social media marketing strategy is built or broken by your content. This is why we make sure your social media content strategy hits that sweet spot
We continuously assess if your social media strategy is effective
It’s important to be able to quickly adapt your Marketing Strategy to ensure a better ROI. We help you see what’s working and what’s not, and then quickly adapt and adjust your strategy to ensure the best bang for your buck


		
	

	
		
			
		
	

	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
			case studies
			
				
					
						
							Piaget Ramadan #TurnLifeOn
						
						Luxury Swiss watchmaker and jewellery brand, Piaget, wanted to mark Ramadan 2022 with a modern campaign for its Possession collection. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							ETHER BY CLOUD SPACES
						
						ASTUDIO's brief was to build an identity, positioning and strategy for the revolutionary retail experience, Ether by Cloud Spaces. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							L’AZURDE - Nuit Blanche
						
						Our brief was to create an aspirational film for L'azurde that highlights their breath-taking jewellery and celebrates the New Year. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Azza Fahmy Real Love
						
						Approaching their 50th anniversary, Azza Fahmy Jewellery wanted to create a standout social media campaign for Mother’s Day. View the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							BVLGARI WONDERS OF LOVE
						
						"The Wonders of Love," showcases love as a universal concept flowing through Ramadan. Through our film campaign, we highlight the brand identity and V in BVLGARI, sharing the wonders of love with V stories that are localized for our Ramadan campaign.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Oman in Venice Art Biennale
						
						We were briefed to position Oman as a top travel destination and get travellers in Venice to visit the Oman Pavilion. Read the complete case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Vyntage Horology
						
						ASTUDIO crafted Vyntage's identity, where modern Emirati vision meets the meticulousness of Swiss watchmaking.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman - A 360 Roadmap
						
						ASTUDIO designed a 360-degree digital strategy for Experience Oman to increase its presence online and meet goals. Find out more about our strategy here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Sharjah Events - 2021 Calendar #SeeSharjah
						
						Sharjah Events launched their 2021 Calendar online to promote big events and activities for the year. Our job was to create an engaging digital strategy.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Mandarin Oriental Social Strategy
						
						The five-star Mandarin Oriental Jumeira in Dubai wanted to stand out from its competitors on social media. Find out exactly how ASTUDIO achieved this.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							HADARA MAGAZINE
						
						For this project, we were tasked to create synergy across Hadara Magazine’s offline and online presence. Find out how we accomplished that.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							SÉLECT LABEL
						
						ASTUDIO combined SELECT LABEL's heritage with modern branding, crafting a captivating narrative showcasing luxury and innovation.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							VOGUE ARABIA FINDING MĀ
						
						ASTUDIO produced a dynamic fashion film for Vogue Arabia where East meets West, which ended up being shortlisted by the London Fashion Film Festival.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							B FOR BEIRUT BVLGARI
						
						BVLGARI partnered with Save the Children and required a film to raise awareness and donations. Learn more about ASTUDIO's approach and end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							ELIE SAAB TIMEPIECES
						
						ASTUDIO was asked to lead the creative and production of the launch campaign for ELIE SAAB Timepieces. Find out more about our marketing approach here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman - Love Summer Again
						
						ASTUDIO created a summer destination campaign for Experience Oman. Have a look at the full brief, our approach and the results in the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							RANA MIKDASHI
						
						We were tasked with creating a complete digital strategy for Rana Mikdashi, a handcrafted, sculptural jewellery brand. Have a look at our strategy here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							THAT CONCEPT STORE
						
						THAT Concept Store, a brand new retail experience inside Mall of the Emirates, was in need of a launch campaign to challenge the norm. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							BVLGARI Jannah, a Five-Petal Story
						
						This campaign features the launch of BVLGARI’s exclusive Jannah jewellery collection, which premiered at Louvre Abu Dhabi. Have a look at the case study.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							MFDP LEGAL
						
						ASTUDIO redefined MFDP's brand, developing contemporary design based on insights about the legal industry.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman Website Wonder
						
						Our aim was to design a mobile-friendly, accessible and beautiful website for Experience Oman. Have a look at our approach and the end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							MANDARIN ORIENTAL EMIRATES PALACE
						
						For the launch of the Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental in Abu Dhabi, we were tasked to create an exceptional film to showcase the hotel. See more here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman OmanByYou
						
						With the help of ASTUDIO, #OmanByYou was the first social media activation by a tourism board that only used UGC for marketing. Read the full brief here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							STORE OF THE FUTURE
						
						ASTUDIO produced over 340 pieces of content to be showcased in Store of the Future when the store opened its doors in Mall of the Emirates. Find out more.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Vogue & WIRED X NEOM
						
						ASTUDIO was commissioned by Vogue Arabia and WIRED ME to document four Saudi women as they explore what NEOM has to offer. View the end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Wego - Holidays
						
						For Wego Arabia’s 2018 summer ad campaign, our brief was to convince consumers to book their holiday online with Wego. Have a look at the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
	
				
				
				
				
					
		
	
What Our Clients Are SayingGaelle DalatiHEAD OF MARKETING AND COMMUNICATIONS / VALENTINO“We highly recommend ASTUDIO. Their unparalleled creativity, attention to detail, and strategic approach in crafting captivating content have elevated our digital presence. Working with ASTUDIO has been a remarkable experience, resulting in tangible business growth. They are the ideal partner for any luxury brand.”
Ashraf AmaaniVP Brand / Mandarin 
Oriental“ASTUDIO has been one of our trusted creative partners since 2019. Their exceptional creativity and unparalleled production capabilities have led to the successful execution of multiple campaigns. We highly recommend ASTUDIO for their expertise in bringing imaginative ideas to life.”
Sughra Alblooshimarketing manager / 
ALDAR Properties PJSC“Working with ASTUDIO has been an absolute game-changer for our business. Their social media services have helped us reach a much wider audience and their digital marketing strategies have significantly boosted our online presence. We couldn’t be happier with the results! Thank you, ASTUDIO, for your exceptional work!”
Lolwah AlomairArt Direction Senior Specialist / SAUDI Public Investment Fund Projects“We are truly grateful to the ASTUDIO team for their exceptional support throughout this project. Their willingness to step in on short notice and their unwavering dedication made all the difference. The collaboration and commitment they showed were invaluable, and we couldn’t have asked for a better team to work with. We’re eagerly looking forward to our next opportunity to create something extraordinary together!”
Sumaya Arifmarketing manager / Sharjah 
Government Media Bureau“ASTUDIO’s social media services have been instrumental in building our brand’s online reputation. Their creative content and strategic approach have captured our target audience’s attention and generated significant leads. We are thrilled with the outcome and look forward to continuing our partnership with ASTUDIO!”
Tarek SabouhCreative Director / Esteé 
Lauder Companies “I applaud ASTUDIO’s exceptional work. Their creative brilliance, attention to detail, and strategic execution of the Kilian Perfume campaign left me impressed. ASTUDIO is the perfect partner for anyone seeking remarkable results.”
Sonia CarpentierDirector of marketing and communication / BVLGARI“ASTUDIO for me, is synonymous of high quality, passion and commitment for productions that contributed to our brand’s magic in the region. The talent of ASTUDIO is to transform a brief into a compelling story, full of emotions. I collaborated with them on several projects and they keep surprising me by their ability to innovate each time.”
Rasha HasanMarketing Manager / 
L'AZURDE“We have been working with ASTUDIO for several years where they have contributed a lot to our brand positioning across various celebrity and corporate campaigns through always providing high quality and engaging content for us with a 360 brand approach. The team are amazing and are a great strategic partner for us!”
Ericka De CesareMarketing Manager / MAJID AL FUTTAIM“ASTUDIO is a professional company with a flexible and collaborative approach. The quality and creativity of our launch campaign were amazing and they delivered our vision perfectly. This is the start of a great partnership and we couldn’t ask for a better team to work with.”

Despite their head office & studio is based in Dubai, we haven’t felt any shortage in the logistics required to close the required successfully. Keep it up”

They are a great team to work with and have always gone above and beyond, we couldn’t recommend them more.”
